This function checks if the specified [[/player.md|player]] is ducked (crouched) or not.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool isPlayerDucked ( player thePlayer )</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePlayer''': A [[/player.md|player]] object referencing the specified player

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the player is ducked, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
This example checks if a random player is ducked or not, and if so displays a message in the chat box.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
aPlayer = getRandomPlayer ( )
if ( isPlayerDucked ( aPlayer ) ) then
	outputChatBox ( getClientName ( aPlayer ) .. " is currently crouching." )
end
</syntaxhighlight>
